lines.text: Looking at the dead wizard's face...
Well, he's really really ugly, ain't he? With those creepy tattoos?
First off, that's a real mean thing to say about a dead guy, kid.
Second: what's that got to do with anything?
Well, you know the old legend of Medusa...
She was cursed to be so ugly, anyone who looked at her <c=#FF00FF>turned to stone!</c>
Maybe that statue <c=#FF00FF>used to be another wizard,</c> but his buddy was such an uggo, that-
I'm gonna stop you right there, kid.
I'm pretty sure there's no way to <c=#FF00FF>turn someone to stone.</c> That's crazy talk.
...yyyyyeah. Right. Definitely not... a magic way... to do... that...
